mapper.sql: a.id, a.equ_id, a.defect_type_id, a.defect_describe, a.data_variable, a.defect_data_level, a.system_id, a.defect_data_category,a.min_speed,a.max_speed,a.expression,a.sort, dt.name as defectTypeName,e.name as equName, s.name as systemName, a.speed_type
6c_defect_assortment a left join 6c_defect_type dt on a.defect_type_id = dt.id left join 6c_equ_position e on a.equ_id = e.id left join 6c_system s on a.system_id = s.id
mapper.select:
select
from
where a.id=#{id} and a.del_flag=0
mapper.update: update 6c_defect_assortment set equ_id = #{equId}, defect_type_id = #{defectTypeId}, defect_describe = #{defectDescribe}, data_variable = #{dataVariable}, defect_data_level = #{defectDataLevel}, defect_data_category = #{defectDataCategory}, min_speed = #{minSpeed}, max_speed = #{maxSpeed}, expression = #{expression}, speed_type = #{speedType}, system_id = #{systemId}, sort = #{sort}, update_ip = #{updateIp}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
